Jotunn turned to see what that was all about.

Jotunn: Motherload, you have=
 an idea of what the plan is. Please look
into that with Lord Elder. I'll b=
e back soon.

He went outside. He briefly saluted the soldier.

Jotunn: At =
ease, Private. You want to join the Dragon Corps, right.
That's fine with m=
e, but you have to show me one thing first. We are
baddest amongst the badd=
est, toughest amongst toughest, stongest
amongst strongest. Prove me you ar=
e too.
